sec.title: Acknowledgments
sec.p: We highly appreciate many members of the frontline medical and nursing staff who demonstrated selfless and heroic devotion to duty in the face of this outbreak.

sec.title: Data availability statement
sec.p: All relevant data are within the manuscript.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: The authors received no specific funding for this work.

sec.title: Declaration of competing interest
sec.p: The authors have declared that no competing interests exist.

sec.title: Ethical approval
sec.p: We have followed all ethical approvals for this study.

sec.title: Informed consent
sec.p: All authors have read and approved the contents and manuscript.
